title: Lavender's Tale: Part Two
description: Lavender has been granted her wish to become Saito’s fuck dog. When she realizes that it entails a total remake of her, physically and mentally, she rues her foolish choice. With the assistance of Saito’s psychotic bedmate, Dr. Linda, Lavender is transformed into an obedient and sexually voracious canine. When she is delivered to her ultimate master, Violet finds her personality as a human slipping away. Only a desperate escape can save her. This novel includes violence and nonconsensual sex. Not for the faint of heart.
author: Paul Blades
